meanings.definition: Believing in or worshiping multiple gods.
meanings.sent1: The ancient civilization was polytheistic, honoring various deities.
meanings.sent2: The festival celebrated the polytheistic beliefs of the community.
meanings.sent3: It's quite polytheistic to have a different god for every aspect of nature.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a polytheistic realm, with thoughts worshipping different ideas.
meanings.sent5: The colorful tapestry depicted a polytheistic universe with countless gods.

meanings.definition: Involving the worship of more than one god.
meanings.sent1: Their polytheistic rituals included offerings to multiple deities.
meanings.sent2: The temple was a place of polytheistic ceremonies and prayers.
meanings.sent3: It seemed polytheistic to pray to both the sun and the moon for good fortune.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a polytheistic paradise, with flowers blooming in honor of different gods.
meanings.sent5: The art displayed a polytheistic scene, with people bowing before various divine figures.
